name: MILD DROWN
description:
This is a short interactivee teaser game for MINDWORLD: Host Connected (mindworldgame.com)
Join the official Discord server to speak about your discoveries: https://discord.gg/S6xmg56hsN

Everything is randomized.

Restart the game at any given time by pressing the F2 key to find everything, from the most common to the rarest.

====================== CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move.

Z/Enter to interact.

X to advance text.
